amendment.description: Amendment sought to reduce funding for United Nations contributions to international organizations by $20 million.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to reduce the amount for Contributions to International Organizations by $20 million.

action.text: By unanimous consent, the Smith (MI) amendment was withdrawn.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Smith (MI) amendment (A025) Failed by recorded vote: 129 - 291 (Roll no. 342).
